mapper.update: update billinginfo set BillingAddress = #{billingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingCity = #{billingCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingState = #{billingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingCountry = #{billingCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingPostalCode = #{billingPostalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BillingId = #{billingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BillingId, BillingAddress, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode from billinginfo
